name: decom_cursor_row_clamp_beyond_region
description: CursorRow (CSI n d) with DECOM on clamps to scroll-region bottom and preserves column
comment: DECSTBM(2,4) -> rows 1..3. DECOM on homes to row 1, col 0. CHA(4) sets col 3. VPA(10) under DECOM maps beyond region and clamps row to 3. Print Q at (3,3).
